title: problem with my connection
body:
i am getting this error after logging in http://prntscr.com/da6zhp 
i tried changing to wireless connection
i flushed my ip 
i changed my dns 
repaired the game 
i got this error after 6.22

tell me what you need to know to help me

replies.body:
It definitely looks like there's an issue between your PC and our servers. It looks like you've already gone through some common solutions, so I'd recommend working through the rest of the steps you haven't already tried inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
i tried most of the solutions and yet i get this new error before even getting in the game http://prntscr.com/dafl6a

I'd like you to try **all** of the solutions listed in the guide that you haven't already tried previously. We need to ensure this isn't caused by **any** of the common issues with local network configurations.

If you continue to have login issues afterward, we can take a look at your network routing.

i tried everything except the port forwarding because i dunno how to set it up even after watching the video
if you could help me how to set it up it would be nice this is how it looks like http://prnt.sc/dagl6t and this is after opening the type menu http://prnt.sc/daglnr

[This website](https://portforward.com/router.htm) has screenshots and instructions for port forwarding on almost any router/modem out there. Try to use that combined with our guide to forward your ports.
i didn't know the website had steps for league of legends thank you so much everything works now
never mind it worked for 1 game then the problem came back

Damn! This is probably something more complicated that we'll need system logs for. I recommend running system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
i figured how to solve it i just used a vpn and that is really strange i dunno why my internet provider would block league of legends

SAME!!! It kicked me and my husband out of our ranked game and then we couldn't log back in. We still can't............ 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
